author: Louise Boyle, George Knowles, Louise Boyle, George Knowles
title: Coronavirus: Live animal markets and wildlife trade continue in Asia amid growing calls for crackdown
description: The novel coronavirus outbreak is believed to have originated at a wildlife market in Wuhan, China and spread to humans due to their close proximity with wild animals
content:
In a bustling meat market on a tourist island in Indonesia on 7 April, a pile of dead bats is laid out for sale on a table next to cuts of fresh pork while a butcher angrily shoos away a customer trying to take pictures of the scene on his iPhone.
Two thousa… [+9835 chars]
